title: SOLD  T3 Turkey Red Amby McConnell PSA 5
author: YazFenway08

posts.post_title: SOLD  T3 Turkey Red Amby McConnell PSA 5
posts.post_content:
Just a beautiful card.  It is a relatively low pop card in this condition...this is one of seven "5"s and I think there are only two "6s" that are higher.  There is a light scratch on the slab just to the right of his glove

$1,375/obo

price includes priority shipping and assumes net PayPal
